skipiste.algorithm

Class NodeDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • skipiste.algorithm.NodeDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<NodeDecorator>, GraphNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARAStarNode, AStarNode, DijkstraNode, IDAStarNode

    public abstract class NodeDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphNode, java.lang.Comparable<NodeDecorator>
    An abstract decorator class that the algorithm specific classes will implement in order to add their extra functionality.
    Author:
    s1011122
